experience: You and Doug both know Jennifer Bookspan, Mary Pugh, and 304 others

Designated Broker of Blue Sky Living, LLC a Residential Real Estate Brokerage and Property Management in the Phoenix, AZ market. Blue Sky Living is a complete residential brokerage using technology to provide high quality, efficient and effective brokerage services with a personal touch.

Arizona Regional Multiple Listing Service "ARMLS" provides Multiple Listing services to its over 28,000 members in the Phoenix, AZ area.   ARMLS provides the MLS for Gilbert, Chandler, Phoenix, Queen Creek, San Tan Valley, Mesa, Scottsdale, Ahwatukee and other cities in Maricopa and Pinal counties. Doug was elected to serve as Treasurer of ARMLS for year 2012.
Doug served as a Director for the Arizona Association of Realtors.
Southeast Valley Regional Association of Realtors - SEVRAR

Doug currently serves on the Board of Directors at the Southeast Valley Association of Realtors.  Doug was elected by the nearly 12,000 members of the Association to serve as a director.  Doug received the highest votes of any candidate in the 2007 election.
Homes for Sale in Maricopa County.  Arizona Short Sale Answers
Arizona Realtor since 1998 serving Relocation clients, Sellers, Buyers, Investors, Short Sale Sellers.
ARMLS (Arizona Regional Multiple Listing Service, Inc.)
